data.message:
Hi 
I had facebook account before with fake name . but someone report me . Im trying too much time to return it back i uploaded my passport copy but always on respond that you cant help me to return it . simply case closed . Is there any criteria to return fake name account or we should registering with real name .

replies.message: Hi Cirine. Facebook is a community where everyone uses the name they go by in everyday life, so you must register with your real name. This makes it so that you always know who you're connecting with and helps keep our community safe. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2yuxoHG. -Elizabeth
Noted . But now i need my account back . I already submit my passport copy and i followed all required .
